description: Powered by Justia, JurisPro (www.JurisPro.com) provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Court Rules Fire Expert Witness Testimony is Not Speculative
cases.description: The testimony of Defendant's Fire Expert Witness was allowed based on his methodology.

cases.title: Testimony of Metallurgy Expert Witness Limited in Hydrochloric Acid Spill Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Metallurgy Expert Witness was allowed to testify on damages, but not on the useful life of metal roofing panels.

cases.title: Neurology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Boating Accident
cases.description: The U.S. District Court (Eastern District of Louisiana) allowed Defendant's Neurology Expert Witness to rely on prior medical records to reach an opinion on Plaintiff's alleged injuries.
